kickstart.post:
if [ -f /opt/rocks/etc/ROCKS-GPG-KEY ] then rpm --import /opt/rocks/etc/ROCKS-GPG-KEY fi
#!/bin/bash
# # saw a race condition where /etc/dhcpd.conf was zero-length, so before # rebuilding the distro, just run an update that will rebuild /etc/dhcpd.conf # and restart dhcpd (this will also restart other relevant rocks services, # e.g., named). # export PATH=$PATH:/opt/rocks/bin rocks sync config
cd &Kickstart_DistroDir;/&Kickstart_PrivateKickstartBasedir; rm -rf rocks-dist rocks create distro
rm -f /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-02-rocks-dist

DISTRO=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report distro` VERSION=`/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report version` ARCH=`uname -i`
mkdir -p $DISTRO/contrib/$VERSION/$ARCH/RPMS mkdir -p $DISTRO/contrib/$VERSION/$ARCH/SRPMS
mkdir -p $DISTRO/site-profiles/$VERSION/graphs/default
